Q: connect to firebird via ODBC: x32 vs x64 A:

The problem is - given the error - that the way you configured your DSN means that you are using embedded mode (you probably did not include a host name in your connection). If you want to use 32 bit embedded mode, then you must have a 32 bit engine12.dll, but currently you have a 64 bit engine12.dll, which can't be loaded in a 32 bit process.

You must either connect to your Firebird server install (through localhost), or install 32 bit Firebird so that you have a 32 bit engine12.dll.

Q: Patrol Flutter integration tests show "0 tests ran" on BrowserStack but pass locally A:

As of now there is no way to specify an alternative host/port for the native-Dart communication on BrowserStack for security and stability reasons.

For more details refer this documentation: https://patrol.leancode.co/documentation/integrations/browserstack

Incase if you faces any issue while running the test on Browserstack please do create a support ticket through contact us page.
